sn35.162:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.162:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā koṭṭhiko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.162:4.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.162:5.1: “Yaṃ kho, koṭṭhika, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn35.162:5.11: Yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ;
sn35.162:5.21: Yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ;
sn35.162:5.31: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccaṃ;
sn35.162:5.33: Yaṃ kho, koṭṭhika, aniccaṃ tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
